name: Restricted Area
description:
Restricted Area - A military plane crashed near your landing site, there may be supplies there. This world is full of cities, in every city there are many houses, in every house there are items. In some rooms you can find weapons, but be careful, the zombies are near.

Your mission is to find an atomic rocket and things required to launch it.

Features
  • Hunger and thirst system
  • Many various weapons
  • Notes that tell you more about the story
  • Beautiful SFX
  • Beautiful World and etc..
